name: SCNAntialiasingMode
desc: Modes for antialiased rendering of the viewâ€™s scene, used by the SCNView property.

items.name: case multisampling2X
items.desc: Enables multisample antialiasing, with two samples per screen pixel.

items.name: case multisampling4X
items.desc: Enables multisample antialiasing, with four samples per screen pixel.

items.name: case multisampling8X
items.desc: Enables multisample antialiasing, with eight samples per screen pixel.

items.name: case multisampling16X
items.desc: Enables multisample antialiasing, with sixteen samples per screen pixel.
